Plugin.name: Dos_Attack_weekness_service_disable
Plugin.Description: Dos 공격에 취약한 echo, discard, daytime, chargen 서비스 활성화 된 경우 비활성화

Command.CommandString: netstat -na | grep '*.13' && for service in echo discard daytime chargen; do grep -q 'disable\s*=\s*yes' /etc/xinetd.d/$service && echo "$service is disabled" || echo "$service is not disabled"; done
